scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "cross-env npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: cross-env ELECTRON=true next build && node scripts/electron-build-helper.js
scripts.electron:build:mac: cross-env ELECTRON=true TARGET_PLATFORM=darwin next build && node scripts/electron-build-helper.js
scripts.electron:build:win: cross-env ELECTRON=true TARGET_PLATFORM=win32 next build && node scripts/electron-build-helper.js
scripts.electron:build:linux: cross-env ELECTRON=true TARGET_PLATFORM=linux next build && node scripts/electron-build-helper.js
scripts.electron:build:all: cross-env ELECTRON=true TARGET_PLATFORM=all next build && node scripts/electron-build-helper.js
